1153322222222111221.content: Light opened his eyes reluctantly. He didn't want to wake up, but he had to go to school. He tried to sit up, but for whatever reason, was unable to. That's when he noticed the baby mobile with the soft blue animals hanging above his head. This was odd. He wasn't a baby, he was practically an adult. He looked to his left, where his bedroom door was, and was greeted by the sight of white bars. He was starting to worry now. He didn't know if this was Sayu messing with him, but he knew he wasn't happy. He called out to Sayu; well, tried to anyway. All that came out were nonsensical babbles. He tried again, but got the same result. He started crying, not entirely sure why, but he didn't know what else to do. He was so busy crying that he didn't even realize somebody was standing right over the cars over the crib on the other side. Suddenly, he was lifted into someone's arms. "Sh, it's ok Light." they said. The voice was male. He looked to the face of the man holding him. It was...
1153322222222111221.title: Yes

choices: Light wakes up a bit later
115332222222211122222.content: Light opened his eyes, yawning. He still felt groggy, but he needed to wake up. He sat up, and was greeted by black bars. "What?" he asked aloud. Looking around his room, or wherever he was, he noticed an abundance of odd changes. First of all, there was a large changing table on the wall opposite him. He looked to the corner he was facing, and saw a rocking chair. It was black with a baby blue cushion, both on the base of the chair, and on the back. It was then that Light looked down at what he was wearing. Covering his torso was a baby blue onesie, only sized for him, and ankle socks of a matching hue. Light felt a thickness around his waist, and moved around a bit. It was like underwear, only way thicker. Light looked toward the ceiling, and noted a baby mobile hanging above him. "Hey, what's going on?" he called out, growing irritated by the prank. He was so wrapped up in his mood that he didn't hear the door open, or the shuffling footsteps that approached him. It was only when he was lifted into someone's arms that he realized that he was not alone anymore. He looked into the face of the person holding him, and gasped. "L, what's going on?" he demanded. "Good morning to you too, Light." L replied calmly. "What is going on here?" Light asked. "I'm simply treating you the way you've wanted to be treated for a long time." L told him. Light blushed. "What? What are you talking about?" Light asked, eyes widening. L chuckled softly. "Oh Light, do you really not understand? Did you think I never noticed how sleepy you get when I hold you in my arms, how relaxed you get when I speak in a low, soft voice? How about how grumpy and upset you become when I let you go, when I leave the room? You clearly need someone to take care of you, Light. I'm doing exactly that." L told the boy calmly. Light didn't know how to respond. He began to cry silently, and L noticed. "Shh shh shh. Don't cry, Light. I'm here. Daddy's here." L cooed, rocking Light, rubbing his back gently. Light cuddled into L's arms, nestling his head into L's neck. L carried Light over to the rocking chair, and sat with him, rocking slowly. Light began calming down, breathing steadily. "There there, my little Light-kun. You're safe with Daddy." L murmured soothingly, kissing the top of Light's head. He pulled a baby blue pacifier out of his pocket and placed it in Light's mouth. Light sleepily cuddled into L's chest, sucking on the pacifier. L carried him over to his crib, and gingerly lay him down. Light's eyes were now closed, and he was asleep. "Goodnight, my little Light-kun." L cooed, turning on the baby monitor and mobile, exiting the nursery.
115332222222211122222.title: Slow

1153322222222111222221.content: As soon as Light woke up, he looked around for L. Where was L? "L? L?" Light asked through his pacifier. He removed it, and sat up, still calling out L's name. The door opened, and in shuffled L. "Hey buddy." L said, walking over to Light's crib. He picked him up, and Light clung to him. "Where's your pacifier?" L asked him. Light held the pacifier up for L to see. L popped it back into Light's mouth, and the boy sucked on it. L carried Light over to the changing table, and lay him down. He unsnapped his onesie, and rolled it up over his chest. L undid the tapes of his diaper, removing it. He cleaned him, causing Light to blush. L placed a clean diaper under Light's bottom, and taped it up snuggly. L rolled Light's onesie back down, and redid the snaps. He picked him up, and Light once again clung to him. "Let's go get you a bottle, Light-kun." L said, and he carried Light to the kitchen. L placed Light in a playpen in the living room, and shuffled into the kitchen to prepare his baby a bottle. Light began to whine. He kicked the walls of the playpen, and reached his arms out toward the kitchen. "Wait a few minutes, Light. Daddy's making you a bottle." L told him, as he put the bottle into the microwave. He set the time for one minute, then checked the temperature. He put the bottle back in for another minute before deeming it warm enough. He carried the bottle into the living room, where he could see Light was really starting to get frustrated. He was clawing wildly at the mesh walls that imprisoned him, crying to be let out. L put the bottle down on the table, and went to get Light. He pulled the boy into his arms, and Light broke down. L tutted softly. "My my, such a fussy baby, aren't we?" he cooed, kissing the top of Light's head. L carried Light to the couch, and set him gently on his lap. L picked up the bottle, and guided it to Light's mouth. Light began to drink the milk, letting up on his crying. Now that he was with his daddy, everything was okay. After Light finished his bottle, L burped him, and cradled him. Light's eyes began to close gently. "Baby boy, you just woke up. If you take a nap now, you're not going to be sleepy at bedtime." L said. Light whimpered, and snuggled into L. "Well, I don't sleep, and we wouldn't want you to be fussy, would we?" L contemplated. He sighed and popped Light's pacifier in his mouth. Light closed his eyes, and snored softly. L smiled as he smoothed out Light's soft chestnut hair. He carried him back up to his nursery, and lay him in his crib. When Light wakes up, L comes in to get him. He carries him downstairs, and Light is shocked to see...
1153322222222111222221.title: Light wakes up a bit later

1153322222222111222222.content: I made my way downstairs and went to work on my computer. It had only been about ten minutes before I heard Light begin to cry. I ran back upstairs, and steered into the nursery. I saw Light sitting up in his crib, and walked over to him. "What's wrong, Light?" I asked. He looked at me with bleary eyes, sniffling. I picked him up and carried him over to the rocking chair, cradling him. He still wouldn't tell me what was wrong, so I took out his pacifier. "Tell Daddy what's wrong, baby." I said. "I don't want my pacifier." he said. "Why?" I asked. "I don't want to become dependent on it." Light mumbled. "It's okay if you become dependent on pacifiers, Light, you're a baby." I told him. He started to whimper, and I popped his pacifier back in his mouth. He started fussing over it, kicking out. I smoothed down his hair, and kissed his forehead. "You're ok, Light-kun." I whispered, rocking him again. He fell asleep, head resting on my chest, sucking his pacifier. I put him back in his crib, and returned downstairs.
1153322222222111222222.title: L's POV

11533222222221112222222.content: Now that Light was sleeping again, I could finally get back to work. I looked over everything I had to do, and I knew everything would take me quite some time to complete. Not wanting Light to be left alone for too long, seeing as he would wake upside time or another, I decided to call in one of my trusted colleagues from the Task Force. Picking up my cell phone, I dialed the number of...
11533222222221112222222.title: Continue L's POV

115332222222211122222221.content:
I picked up my cell phone, and dialed Aizawa's number. He picked up on the third ring. "Aizawa speaking." he answered. "Aizawa, it's me. I need you to come babysit Light." L told him. "Eh...what?" Aizawa asked, confused. "Long story. The point is, I have too much work to do and I don't want him to feel neglected." L said. "That sounds a bit nutty, but I guess I'll come over." Aizawa replied. "Thanks. I appreciate it." L said. He hung up, and put his phone down. He sat in silence for a few minutes, and decided to check on Light. He went up to the nursery, and saw his baby still sleeping. He smoothed out Light's hair, and kissed him on the forehead. "Be good, my little Light-Kun." he whispered, leaving the room.
After L had informed him of the situation, Aizawa sat in the living room, thinking it over. L was currently busy working. 'Maybe this is good for them. L seems happier than he has. Less tired, too.' he thought, stroking his chin with his index finger and thumb. He was suddenly pulled from his thoughts when he heard Light crying over the baby monitor. He headed upstairs, not expecting anything more than this to be a complete joke. When he opened the door of the nursery, he was greeted by the sight that one would get with a baby. But Light wasn't a baby; not physically, anyway. Aizawa walked over to the crib, and looked in. "Light?" he asked. Light's milk chocolate eyes locked on his. His eyebrows furrowed in confusion. "Hey." Aizawa said quietly, not wanting to scare the boy. He picked him up, and carried him downstairs. Light sucked on his pacifier. Where was his daddy?
After a good few hours of Light playing quietly on the floor, Aizawa looked at his watch. It was 7 o'clock. L had said that Light's bedtime was 8. "Okay, Light, I gotta get you fed and ready for bed." he said, walking over to Light. He picked him up, and carried him to the kitchen. Grabbing a bottle and heating it up, he carried Light upstairs. Once back in the nursery, Aizawa sat Light on the changing table, putting the bottle on the dresser. He changed Light into a red onesie, and put red ankle socks on his feet. Picking hi up again, he carried the boy to the rocking chair, sitting. Aizawa positioned Light, and was about to feed him his bottle. Light decided that this was the perfect time to voice his concerns. "Where's Daddy?" he asked. "He's working, buddy. He'll come in and say goodnight when he's done." Aizawa told him. This answer was unacceptable to Light. He began crying. Aizawa groaned, but worked to console the boy in his lap. He carried him around, bouncing him gently. "Shh shh shh. You're fine. Don't cry, baby boy." Aizawa said. After a minute or so, Aizawa heard someone clear their throat. He turned to face the door, and saw L standing there. "Daddy!" Light cried, reaching out for him. "Hey, Light-Kun." L greeted. Light continued reaching out for L. "No, Light-Kun. Not right now. Daddy needs to get back to work." L said in a low voice. "Daddy?" Light asked. L pressed his forehead against Light's, taking the boy's hands in his own. "You're okay, little one. Be good for your uncle Aizawa and drink your bottle." L soothed. This calmed light down. He would give Aizawa a chance, now that he knew his daddy still loved him. L kissed Light's forehead, and left. Aizawa sat back down with Light, positioning him as he had before. "Ready to try this again?" Aizawa asked. Light nodded sleepily. Aizawa smiled, and gave Light the bottle. He rocked while Light drank the warm milk, growing sleepier and sleepier. After the bottle was empty, Aizawa gently patted Light's back, causing him to burp. "Daddy." Aizawa heard Light mutter. "Shh. I've got you, little one. Go to sleep." Aizawa soothed in a low rumble. The gentle vibrations of his chest lulled Light into a serene slumber. The gentle rocking was a comfort to both Light and Aizawa. Aizawa let his eyelids flutter closed.
L had just finished his work. He sighed in relief. He was ready to see how Aizawa had done getting the baby to bed. L walked upstairs, hoping Light was having a pleasant sleep. L opened the nursery door, and smiled at the sight that greeted him. Light was asleep on Aizawa's chest, sucking his pacifier. Aizawa had his head tossed slightly back, sleeping soundly. L picked up Light, and carried him to his crib. Before setting him down, he kissed his baby's soft cheek. L tucked Light in with his baby blue blankie, and tucked a plush bear in the crook of his left arm. L walked back over to Aizawa, and gently shook his shoulder. He opened his eyes, and looked up. "Hey. Where's Light?" he asked. L indicated to the crib, and Aizawa nodded. "Sorry for falling asleep. I know how unprofessional it must seem." the man apologized, eyes cast downward. "It's perfectly fine. It's late. Now go home and get some rest." L said. He walked to the front door with Aizawa. "Here. It's not much, but-" L started, getting cut off by his comrade. "No. I'm perfectly happy doing a job for free. It was a good night." Aizawa replied with a shake of his hand. "If you insist." L said, tucking the money back into his wallet. Aizawa put on his shoes and pulled on his coat. "Any time you need a babysitter, call me. I'd be happy to watch Light again." Aizawa said. He took his leave. L smiled slightly, and headed upstairs. He quickly went to the bathroom, preferring to do it now rather than three hours from now. He realized the baby monitor was currently off. He knew he should turn it on. He opened the nursery door, and shuffled toward the crib. He switched on the baby monitor, and turned to leave. "Goodnight, little one." L cooed, turning back around. He reached over the bars to stroke Light's hair. Something was wrong. The crib was empty, and the window was wide open. L booked it downstairs, and flung the front door open. He looked out into the darkness just in time to see a van's headlights bid farewell as harsh laughter sliced the pitch black night's silent atmosphere like a knife.
115332222222211122222221.title: Aizawa

It had been awhile since Molly

been shrunk to bug sized.


Now again young Molly was feeling quite
small and often ignored.
On this night though she saw some shooting stars.


“It’s no fair! I’m tired of feeling small Lucy”
she said hugging her doll.

She looked at the shooting stars
“I wish I were big so then Kit wouldn’t pick
on me and grown ups wouldn’t ignore me”


That night Molly went to bed unaware her
wish would work and maybe just too well.

12533222222222211212222122222222211.content:
So, how will Twilight Sparkle and Applejack end up swapping bodies with each other's older brothers, Big McIntosh and Shining Armor?

How about this way?: After finding a new, enchanted appletree in their orchard, Appplejack and Big Mac invite Twilight and Shining Armor over to be the first to taste these enchanted apples. However, as soon as they bite the apples, Twilight swaps bodies with Big McIntosh, while Applejack swaps bodies with Shining Armor! This causes the four ponies to freak out, since they are now not olny the opposite gender, but a different pony species! (Applejack and Big Mac are Earth Ponies, Shining Armor is a Unicorn Pony, and Twilight is an Alicorn Pony.) Furthermore; they find that the tree and the apples from it, have disappeared, leaving them stuck in the bodies of each other's siblings!

Now, the four ponies have their own unique problems to overcome. Twilight and Applejack will both have to get used to Big Mac's and Shining Armor's bodies, which are larger than what they are used to, as well as the fact that those bodies are male, while individually, Twilight has to get used to not being able to use magic or fly anymore and Applejack has to get used to using Shining Armor's horn to do magic with.

Meanwhile; Big Mac and Shining Armor will both have to get used to Twilight's and Applejack's bodies, which are smaller than they are used to, as well as the fact that those bodies are female, while individually, Shining Armor has to get used to not being able to use magic anymore and Big Mac has to get used to both being able to use Twilight's wings to fly and her horn to use magic with.

Is this an OK scenario?
12533222222222211212222122222222211.title: Sibling ex-swap-aganza!

Wily Kat sat with Wily Kit, watching as Lion-o, continued to train with Tygra, Cheetara and Panthro, wishing he could join them. Looking over towards his sister, Wily Kat groaned at the sight of Kit, Ogling Lion-o. Her crush was obvious, but he was too fixated on Cheetara to notice her. Bored, Wily Kat just laid back, to look at the night sky, when he saw beam of light flash across it. 'Wish Kit and I could have what we want', Wily Kat thought as the beam disappeared.

Wily Kat let out a yawn, "I'm going to bed.", he said.

"You sure.", Wily Kit said, not taking her eyes off Lion-o.

"Yeah. See you in the morning.", Wily Kat said before heading towards where he and Wily Kit usually slept.

12533222222222222221221211111.content:
Wilykit watched from a nearby cliff, while Lion-o trained with Cheetara and Tygra. She smiled as Lion-o managed to hold both off. There was so much she wished she could say to Lion-o, if only she was a little older.

"There you are.", She heard Wilykat say as he walked towards her. He then sat beside her."Come on, lets go have some fun."

"You can go, I want to watch.", Wilykit said, still not taking her eyes off of Lion-o.

"Oh come on. You watch all the time.", Wilykat said.

"What, it's fun.", Wilykit said.

"Oh sure...", Wilykat said, standing up and slowly walking away. "You know all this watching isnt going to change anything."

Wilykit ignored him and continued to watch. Hours later Wilykit prepared for bed. Unable to sleep she looked up at the stars, thinking. 'I guess Kat is right, what will it change', she though. "I just wish we could be the same age." she said.

125332222222222222222211221122211.content:
One day, young Arthur Read was walking to school, when he saw an old lady.
She blocked his path. "I am a witch," she said. "I can grant you or your friends wishes."
"You can't really be a witch," said Arthur, "because witches don't exist."
"You dare doubt me?" said the witch, angrily.
And with that, she pointed her walking stick at Arthur and it shot out a green light.

The next day, Arthur felt...different..in his pants.
He tried to call out for his parents but his voice was too high.
He looked in the mirror and he saw that he had poofy hair like his mother.

He ran into his parents' room and said, "Mom, Dad, why is my voice so high and my hair different?".
"What are you talking about, Alice?" said his dad. "You seem the same to me."
"Alice?" said Arthur.
"Yes, that's your name," said his mother. "Now you get dressed while I make breakfast."

Arthur went to get dressed and found that his clothes were...

One morning, Arthur woke up and got dressed.

When he went down for breakfast, he saw his mother making pancakes, but she was levitating, about a foot off the ground.
His father was trying to spoon-feed Kate but--the spoon seemed to be floating into her mouth by herself!
And then, Kate disappeared and, a split second later, reappeared on the floor next to Arthur.
"Come on, Kate, you gotta finish your breakfast!" said Mr Read and he focused his gaze on Kate, who floated back into her highchair.

Then, D.W. came running in, but she didn't use the door, she just passed through it as though it were made of thin air!

"Breakfast is ready," said Mrs Read as she floated over to the table and set four places at the table.
"What's going on?!" said Arthur with his mouth full of pancake. "Am I seeing things? You're all floating and walking through walls and stuff!"
"Don't talk with your mouth full, Arthur," said David. "And it's normal in this family, you should know that. We all have superpowers! I'm telekinetic, your mom can float in the air, Kate can teleport and D.W. can walk through walls. What's your power?"
"I don't have a power," said Arthur, noting to himself to ask the Brain what 'telekinetic' meant.
"Of course you do," said his father. "Everyone in this family has a power!"

When Arthur woke up, he found out that, although his bed and other furniture and stuff was the same size, his room was enormous. It was big enough so that his furniture only fit in a tiny corner of it.

He thought that was strange, but that it must be a trick of the light and got dressed and walked out into the hallway.
He found that the staircase was huge too but that there was a regular-sized one next to it.
He walked down that, into the kitchen, which was also huge, and so was the table but the kitchen furniture was regular size.
He noticed that the table had one giant chair, a giant highchair, and all the other chairs were normal size but their legs were crazy long so they could reach the table and had ladders going up. Mrs Read climbed up three ladders and set breakfast plates for herself, her husband David, and Arthur, who climbed up one for breakfast.
Then, Mrs Read picked up a megaphone and shouted, "Breakfast is ready!!!".

In came Mr Read, who climbed onto a chair for breakfast, followed by a GIGANTIC D.W., who was carrying a smaller, but still GIGANTIC Kate.
The giant D.W. put the giant Kate into the giant high chair, then reached into a humongous cupboard and got a giant bowl, which she filled with cereal. Then, she reached into a giant fridge next to the regular fridge and took out some milk and a giant baby bottle and filled her cereal bowl and Kate's bottle and started eating and feeding Kate.

What happens now?

1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.content:
One morning, Arthur woke up and found that his room appeared to be much bigger.
His furniture was the right size, but his room was huge.
When he got dressed and wandered out, he saw that the rest of the house seemed much bigger too.
"Have I shrunk?" he wondered.
Then, he saw Pal, who looked enormous to him, and got on his back and rode to the kitchen.

There, his father, who towered over the pair of them, was making breakfast.
"Breakfast is ready!", he called, and set two places at the (now huge compared to Arthur) table with waffles and honey.
D.W. came downstairs, holding Kate, who both looked like giants themselves, but then his mother walked hesitantly downstairs and appeared to be a normal size to him.
Then, D.W. put Kate in her highchair, sat at a chair, and started eating her waffles.
Mr. Read picked up his wife and son and put them on the kitchen bench, then handed them a plate with a crumb on it for them to eat.

"What's going on?!" said Arthur, "why is everything except Mom and I so big?!"

"It's you who are small," said his dad, "And it's always been that way. I remembered when you were a baby we had to make your own diapers."

What does Arthur do now?

1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.content:
When Arthur woke up, he noticed his room was weird.

It was painted red and green and white, like a candy bar, and when he looked in his closet, he couldn't find his normal outfit, they were all strange outfits that looked like what a prince from a fairy tale would wear, and his glasses were green and glittery with hearts on them.

He finally put on an outfit, deciding to ask his parents at breakfast.
At breakfast, the kitchen was oddly-decorated too, and his family had altered drastically.

His mother was wearing a purple dress with punctuation marks embroidered all over, his father was wearing a neon pink tuxedo, and he was pouring milk on D.W.'s cereal.

D.W. herself was dressed up as a fairy, and Kate was wearing a grey onesie with little ears and a tail so she looked like a miniature cat.

"Have you all gone mad?!" said Arthur.
"What's gotten into you?", said Mrs Read, pouring Arthur some juice, "everybody's mad in Wonderland."
"But this is Elwood City!", said Arthur.
"Stop making places up," said Mr Read.

Just then, Spanky flew in and said, "Here comes Pal, prince of dogs!".
"I thought he was dead," said Arthur.
"Nope, I'm very much alive," said Spanky.

Pal crawled in, wearing a crown, and, much to Arthur's surprise, spoke.
"What a wonderful morning, subjects!", said Pal in a pompous voice, "May I prithee has't some bacon?"

"Certainly, Your Highness," said Mrs Read and fed Pal.

What happens now?
1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.title: Yes

1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.content: What alternate universe is it?
1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.title: No

1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.content:
Arthur woke up and got dressed, then he went downstairs for breakfast, but something strange was happening.

Everything except his own stuff was much bigger, as if the house was made for people seven times his height.
And where Pal's dish was, instead were four dishes, marked "Arthur", "Jane", "David", and "Dora Winifred".
Just then, Pal came running in on his hind legs, only he was enormous; Arthur only came up to his ankles due to the fact that dogs stand on their tiptoes, and he wasn't wearing a collar.
Then, Pal barked loudly and his family came running in.
They were all wearing collars that had their names and phone numbers written on the tags.
"What?!" said Arthur, "What's going on".
Pal barked sternly at Arthur.
"We have to whisper while we're indoors," whispered Mr Read, "he can't understand English so we don't know why."

The giant Pal then put a collar on Arthur and poured cereal and milk into the four bowls and handed each of the Reads a spoon, which they used to eat out of the bowls on the floor.

Then, Pal picked up Kate and started spoon-feeding her baby food.

What happens now?

One morning, Arthur Read woke up, but something was different.
His room appeared much, much bigger (little did he know that he was just smaller.)
And surrounding his bed were railings at least twice his height.
"Hey, Arthur," said a voice that sounded a lot like his mother's.

Arthur looked around.
It was a baby with dark hair in a style that resembled his mother's, in a crib the size of the one Arthur was in, and she appeared to be Arthur's size.
"Where am I? Who are you? And are you a talking baby?!" said Arthur.
"You're at home and I'm Jane, silly," said the baby, "and of course I can talk. Well, to you at least, I don't understand that bizarre language that people older than us speak."

Arthur was confused.

Just then, a woman walked in.
She was an aardvark like himself and the baby who called herself Jane and her hair was red, she wore it in a bob.
She had on a pink blouse and green jeans and was at least five times Arthur's height.
"Wakey, wakey, Arthur and Jane," she said in a singsong voice, lifting the baby Jane out of her crib, then taking off her onesie, changing her diaper, and dressing her in a little magenta dress, white shoes and a white hair bow.

Then, the woman lifted up Arthur and placed him on the changing table and started to take off his clothes.
Arthur was shocked to see that he had a diaper on underneath and even more shocked when the woman took it off, changed it and placed him in blue shoes and a little yellow T-shirt.

What happens now?
1253322222222222222222112211222222222222.title: Last do it

Arthur's morning was pretty much the same, he'd woken up, had breakfast and gotten ready.
It was at school that things started to be a little different.
Buster didn't show up on the way to school and he wasn't at school.
"Must be either late or absent," thought Arthur.
But then, he saw that all his male friends seemed to be late or absent.
Molly was on the jungle gym, but Rattles, Slink and Binky were not present, which was odd, as usually the Tough Customers hung out there together.
George was nowhere to be seen and neither was The Brain.
Arthur decided to ask Molly what was going on.
"Where are Rattles, Slink and Binky?" he asked.
"Who?" she asked.
"You know, your best friends? Binky's surname is Barnes," said Arthur, hoping she'd remember.
Molly didn't know.

In class, Arthur was happy to see that Francine, Muffy, Ladonna, Jenna, Maria, Fern and Sue Ellen were still around but was a bit worried that George, Binky and The Brain were not there.
He hoped they were all right.

Continue the story from here.

P.S. What's become of Mei Lin (Binky's adopted sister)?

"Why can't I come to the wedding?" asked D.W. "It's not at nighttime or anything".
"Well," said Jane. "The people in charge says it's only for grownups."
"That's not fair," said D.W., going into a sulk.
Arthur just shrugged. He didn't want to go to the wedding anyway. Being babysat by Grandma Thora was more interesting.

Thora arrived and Arthur greeted her but D.W. just sat in her room. "I wish I was a grownup," she said.
Just then, a fairy flew into the house.
"Who are you?" asked D.W.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
I bet by now you're wondering why Francine wanted to be a year younger.

Well, the reason is that over the past few days, the Sugar Bowl had been giving out free cupcakes, but only for those seven years old or younger, so naturally Francine wanted to be seven years old so that she could be young enough to get free cupcakes, but not too young.

Buster and Ladonna, being the big eaters they were, kind of wanted that too, and so did Arthur to an extent, but Francine was the only one brave enough to actually ask to be zapped with the youth gun.

So today, she was over at the Brain's house.
"And remember," she said, "I only want to be one year younger."

Brain set the trigger for one year younger, but it accidentally made her one year *old*, which was six years younger than she wanted to be.

He was worried now. He made a mental list of his problems:

1.) Francine now needed diapers and some clothes that fit her.

2.) He had no idea how to turn her back.

3.) It was sure to get him into trouble with Mr. Ratburn and with Francine's family too.

4.) He didn't know how his friends would react, particularly Muffy, who was Francine's best friend.

What does he do first?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: 1 year old.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content: He explains to the others what happened, but, who does he run into first after getting what he needs?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: Other.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
"OK," thought Brain, "the first thing I need to do is get what I need."
He picked up Francine, wrapped her in a towel, and went off to the shop, taking some money with him.
He left a note for his parents, which read: "Gone for a walk. Urgent. Back in time for dinner."

Then, he went to a baby supplies shop and bought a onesie in her size and a pack of diapers.

After diapering and dressing Francine, he decided he'd better tell everybody what happened, and decided to start with Muffy, since she was Francine's best friend.

He went to the Crosswire mansion and knocked on the door.

Bailey, the butler answered.
"Good afternoon, Mr Alan Powers and...whoever the infant is. Do you wish to speak to Muffy?"
"Yes," said the Brain.
"She's in her bedroom," said Bailey.

Brain walked up the stairs to Muffy's bedroom, still carrying Francine.
"Muffy," he said, "There's been an accident. Remember how Francine wanted to test out my youth gun so she could get the free cupcakes? Well, something went wrong and she's now one year old."

What does Muffy do?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: Muffy.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:

"You'd better hurry up!" said Muffy to Brain, and to Francine she said, "I am not your mother! I am eight years old and I'm your best friend, not your mom! Call me Muffy. Can you say Muffy?"

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
Francine suddenly thought about things.
First it began to feel weirder wearing a diaper and onesie.
Then, she started to remember being bigger.
Then, she started being able to read things and do other things.
Finally, her memory came back.
After fifteen minutes, she had her normal mind back and remembered who Sadie was.
Sadie then woke up.
"Okay, let's play," she said.
"Not until you tell me why you turned me into a baby," said Francine.
"I don't understand," said Sadie.
"Oh, yes you do," said Francine, "don't play dumb. I remember now."
What does Sadie do?

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
Francine started to cry.
Her "new friend" had fallen asleep and she was bored.
Catherine heard the crying from the living room.
"That's odd," she thought, "Francine's just gotten back from the toy store; she shouldn't be sad. And she doesn't sound like that when she cries."
So she decided to come in and see if her sister was all right.

When she arrived, she saw a very strange site: two babies, who looked about one, were on the floor and Francine was (for all she knew) gone, but her clothes were in a pile on the floor.

Both babies looked a lot like Francine when she was one, but one of them had pigtails.
The one with the pigtails (Sadie) was wearing blue booties and a yellow dress and was fast asleep, and the one without the pigtails (Francine) was wearing a red onesie and crying her eyes out.
"Mom! Dad! Francine's gone and there are two babies here!" she said.
Then, the parents ran in and found out it was true.

What do they do first?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: Catherine.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
Mrs. Frensky was concerned.
She heard loud crying coming from her daughters' room.
They didn't have any visitors, her husband and Catherine were in the living room with her, so that left only Francine, but she'd just gotten back from the toy store.
Furthermore, Francine didn't cry like that.
So Mrs. Frensky walked into her daughters' room to see if Francine was OK.
When she got there, Francine and Sadie were as they were but Mrs. Frensky didn't recognize them.

From her perspective, Francine was gone and her clothes were in a pile on the floor.
There were two babies of about one year old on the floor and both looked a lot like Francine when she was a baby but one of them had pigtails.
The pigtailed one had a yellow dress and blue booties and was asleep and the non-pigtailed one was wearing a red onesie and crying.
"Oliver, come here!" she said.
Mr. Frensky came in.
"Who are they?! Where's Francine?!" he said.
"I don't know," she said.

What do the parents do?

One day, Lakewood Elementary was having a school fair.

Arthur's class were looking around the stalls, when Francine started to drink from a bottle she found on one of the stalls.
"Do you know what that is?" asked the stall owner in a worried voice.
"No, what is it?" said Francine.
"It's a youth potion!" said the stall owner.
Just then, Francine started to get younger, but how much younger?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: No, a potion she drank by accident, mistaking i...

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content: Which age out of these does she become?

"But I don't want to be younger," said Francine.
"Tough luck," said the owner.
Francine then started to shrink until she was the size of Kate, then she continued shrinking, her legs gave way, her hair became much shorter and she had less of it, and her teeth disappeared.
When it was over, she was only a newborn baby.
"You turn my best friend back right now!" said Muffy angrily.
"I can't," said the owner, "but don't worry, she will turn back to normal. How old was she?"
"Eight," said Arthur.
"And now she's a newborn, so she's lost eight years. That means you have to wait eight days. In the meantime, take this," said the stall owner.

The owner handed them a bag. Inside were diapers, baby clothes, a bottle and some formula.

Arthur picked Francine up and put one of the diapers on her, having had experience from that times when he had to change Kate's diapers.
"This feels so weird," he said.

After putting the diaper on her, he put a little onesie on her.

What do they do now?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: Newborn.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
"But I don't want to get younger!" said Francine.
The stall owner just shrugged as Francine began to shrink.

Soon, she was only 35 inches tall and her clothes were way too big.
"How old am I now?" she said, in a high voice.
"I think you're about two," said the stall owner, "but don't worry. How old were you?"
"Eight," said Francine.
"Well, then you've lost six years, so you'll be eight years old again in six days. In the meantime, take these," and she handed her some leggings, socks, underwear and a shirt that suited her new age.

Where does Francine get changed?

choices: The parents or her nanny discover her.
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
So Emily now knew how babies thought because she was thinking like one!
In case you don't know much about babies, here's what's going on with her.

1. She cannot walk, crawl or talk, but, because she's in the Arthur universe, she can talk to other babies, and animals.
2. She has no teeth and can only drink milk or formula.
3. As she's a newborn, she can't even babble yet.
4. She doesn't know what anything is anymore because she has the mind of a newborn!
5. Memories are part of the mind, so if she has the mind of a newborn, she's also lost her memory.
6. She's not potty trained anymore and needs diapers.
7. She needs feeding every four hours and sleeps an awful lot.

What happens now?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: Yes.

1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.content:
So she isn't quite experiencing how babies think.
That means...

1. She can't understand babies and animals, and she can understand people. Speaking is a bit tricky for her because she has a newborn's mouth and throat, but she can try.
2. She has the physical body of a newborn, hindering her ability to walk, but because she's mentally four years old, she still can.
3. She still knows how the world works and has the same sleep schedule as a preschooler, but is a newborn's size.
What happens now?
1253322222222222222222122222222222222222.title: No.

1253322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
One afternoon, Lisa said, "I invented a shrink ray, but it only works on humans, so I need to test it on somebody. Who will volunteer?"
"Not me, thank you!" said Lincoln.
"Me neither," said Lynn, Sr., "And I'd put it away if I were you."
"Your father's right," said Rita.
"And there's no way I'm going to be small. What would Bobby think?" said Lori.
"And I don't want to be smaller than Lana, she'd pick on me too much!" said Lola.
"The feeling is mutual," said Lana.
"Do I look like I want to shrink?" asked Lucy.
"And that would cause some 'small' problems," said Luan, giggling.
"Don't look at me," said Lynn.
"Me neither, dude," said Luna.
"And, uh, seeing as everyone else is saying no, it must be bad?" said Leni uncertainly.
"So that leaves only Lily!" said Lisa, firing the shrink ray at Lily and making her newborn-sized.
What happens now?

1353322222121222121.title: Age transformation.

13533222221212221211.content:
One day, Worf was taking Alexander to the study hall, when Q interrupted him in the foyer. "I see the big, strong Klingon security officer is a daddy!" he said in his cheeky voice. "Yes!", said Worf grumpily.
"Well, I wonder what you were like when you were his age. Only one way to find out", and snapped his fingers.
Worf didn't have time to reply until he was standing there, five years old, the same age as little Alexander.
"Father?" said Alexander. "I didn't enjoy childhood even when I was a child", grumped Worf.

1353322222121222221211.content:
One day, the U.S.S. Enterprise got hailed by an alien. It was a weird alien, with green skin, six eyes, and four antennae.
"Hey, check out my monkey phaser!" said the alien and shot Data with a strange piece of equipment which turned Data into a monkey. Before Picard could tell him no, the alien turned tail and ran.

Data tried to talk, but he couldn't say anything because he was a monkey. "I don't want Data to be a monkey," said Riker. "I mean, monkeys are cute, but turning Data into a monkey? Our ship wouldn't be the same with a monkey on the bridge. And besides, monkeys can't talk."

"We will find a way to turn Data back into Data....I hope," said Picard. "I think I will contact Star Fleet.

Picard, however, was not able to find the right words for this silly, but also serious, situation. "I...I have unusual news. It's about Data."

"You want some data?" said the person on the other end of the screen. "Data on what?"

Picard decided to be straightforward. "Data's a monkey," he said.

"You want data on monkeys? What kind of data on monkeys?" said the person.

"No", said Picard. (P.S. This chapter was inspired by a weird dream I had so excuse me if it doesn't make sense.)

What happens next?

135332222212222.content: This popped into my head: Two crewmembers get younger: Trip becomes 16 and Hoshi becomes 3. Can we do this?
135332222212222.title: Enterprise.

choices: Stay on the planet to fix the equipment.
Go back to Enterprise to figure out why Trip and Hoshi have regressed.
1353322222122221.content:
One time, Captain Archer got hailed by an Andorian.
The Andorian said, "Come down to Andoria at once because there has been an incident and I need you to repair a piece of equipment." Archer then said "Okay, we'll be on our way." and went down in a shuttle pod with Trip to do the repair work, T'Pol in case anything scientific needed to be discussed, and Hoshi in case anything needed translating.
When they got to the icy surface of Andoria, Trip stood on a piece of ice and fell down into a hole. "Trip!" shouted Hoshi and she took a step and fell into the hole herself. "Trip! Hoshi! Are you okay?" said Archer. Just then, Trip climbed out, but he looked much younger. He looked about sixteen. "Who are you?" asked Captain Archer. "Where is Commander Tucker?" asked T'Pol. "I AM Trip!" said the sixteen-year-old boy. "Well, his appearance does match Sim's at apparent age sixteen, and so it is logical to explore the possibility that he is Trip, however, I am not familiar with any phenomenon that could make his age reverse." "Neither am I", said Archer. "Where is Hoshi?" "I'm Hoshi!" said a high voice from inside the hole, and when they looked down, there was a little girl who was definitely Hoshi, but much younger, about three years old. Archer helped little Hoshi get out, then added to his log, "Captain's log. While on a mission on Andoria to repair some equipment, Commander Tucker and Ensign Sato have aged down to ages sixteen and three respectively. Subcommander T'Pol and I are at a loss for what to do."

What do Archer and T'Pol do now?
1353322222122221.title: Trip and Hoshi get Younger

13533222221222211.content:
"Well, Trip, can you still fix the Andorian equipment?", asked Archer. "You betcha!" said the now sixteen-year-old Trip. "I could fix things when I was sixteen for the first time round!".
"Good," said Archer. "You fix the equipment while T'Pol watches you in order to make sure nothing goes wrong, after all, we don't know what caused this change. I will watch Ensign Sato."
"Speaking of Ensign Sato," said T'Pol, as Trip started working on the Andorian equipment. "What shall we do with her? After all, Commander Tucker can look after himself somewhat, but Ensign Sato is too young to be left alone."
"I will watch her until Trip finishes his repair work. Then, we will ask Phlox what to do about her and Trip."

T'Pol went off to watch Trip, while Archer stayed with little Hoshi. "I'm bored, there's nothing to do!" she said. "Well, here's some water in case you get thirsty and some rations in case you get hungry. I will try to keep you entertained," said Archer.

How does Archer entertain Hoshi?
13533222221222211.title: Stay on the planet to fix the equipment.

13533222221222212.content:
"Sorry about the equipment, sir," said Archer. "But it seems that our crew members are in an unusual state and we must leave. We promise to get back to you when we're available." "I can actually do it," said Trip. "I could fix things when I was in first grade." "That may be so," said Captain Archer. "But we need to make sure you're both safe." So Archer, T'Pol, 16-year-old Trip, and 3-year-old Hoshi climbed into the shuttle-pod and went back to Enterprise.

"You see, Phlox," said Archer. (They were in Sickbay, little Hoshi was playing with Phlox's bat and Archer, younger Trip, and T'Pol were talking to Phlox about what may have caused this incident. "Trip and Hoshi seem to have...become younger." Phlox scanned T'Pol. "Well, there is nothing the matter with you" he said. He then scanned Trip and Hoshi. "You seem fine too, except your life signs match those of children ages sixteen and three respectively. I don't know how this could have happened, but I don't see any cause for concern, and Trip should still be able to work in engineering." "But what about Hoshi?" asked Archer. "She's too young to be left alone."

Who is left in charge of Hoshi?

Season 1 AU: During Nightmares, Billy thinks Buffy is cute, and wishes he could see what she was like at his age. She changes, but for some reason when he wakes up, Buffy still remains in the body of a 12 year old.

Season 2 AU: During Killed By Death, even sick, Buffy is unable to see the demon, but realizes only children can see it, and asks an inexperienced Willow to perform a spell, to return her to an age she can see it, but once the demon is dead, Willow does not know how to reverse the spell.

Season 3 AU: During Ginerbread, knowing that only a child could get through to the adults, Willow transforms, her, Amy and Buffy into children.

Season 4 AU: During This Years Girl, Faith's device, does not switch their bodies but regresses the two to little girls.

Season 5 AU: During The Replacement, the blast hits Buffy, splitting the Slayer from her inner child.

Season 6 AU: During Bargaining, Buffy is brought back, but when she is discovered, she is much younger than she was when she died.

Season 7 AU: During Chosen, with the Spell activated, Buffy no longer finds herself in the Hellmouth, but on a baseball field, in the body of a newly awakened 12 year old slayer.

145322.content: How about multiple transformations at once?
145322.title: Try this?

choices: The new Linguini romances the new Colette
Colette discovers a new life as a rat
14532211.content:
Colette was getting angry, and of course, Linguini was too awkward to express himself properly about how he felt about her. Remy saw what was happening, and knew that he needed to step in, so he grabbed a some hair and started to do his thing. Soon, A surprised Colette, and an even more surprised Linguini were in a passionate embrace, kissing each other.

Unfortunately for them, well Colette and Linguini perhaps, a witch was flying over, and witnessed the strange scene. Of course, she could sense Remy, and knew what he was doing, and feeling mischievous, she decided they were all mixed up already, so why not give them all new perspectives? She cast her spell, and then flew off laughing to herself.

On the ground, all three of the participants felt a strange tingle in their bodies.Remy had not considered on consequence though, as Colette insisted on showing Linguini her flat. By the time they got there though, all three of them were feeling very strange indeed.

As she opened the door, Colette said, "I am sorry Linguini. I was going to invite you in for a glass of wine, but I am feeling very strange and weak right now."

He was squirming. "Me too. May I just come in and sit down for a minute before I go?" She let him in, and as he came in, he was very careful to sit his hat down so that Remy was still hidden.

Things started to accelerate just then. Linguini looked at Colette, who had shrunk significantly, and noticed her nose seemed to be getting darker, and starting to push out from her face in a strange way. He felt something strange in his body too, but he was too busy trying to figure out what he was seeing to take notice. She was continuing to shrink, and her ears were changing and pushing out from her head in an odd way as her hair seemed to be getting shorter on her head. He blinked, was it starting to cover her body.

What neither noticed was that Remy had been growing, and rapidly. Even now, he was as tall as Linguini, and was taking on a human form. Even clothing was appearing on him as he continued to change.

As Linguini watched, Colette shank so far and so fast that she vanished into her clothing! He was about to jump up, but suddenly, the seemingly empty pile of clothing slowly vanished, and as it did, it revealed a brown-haired, female rat! He called out, "Colette! What has happened to you!?!" But his voice sounded funny. Familiar, yet funny for him. He looked down at himself, and as a strand of dark hair fell into his eyes, he could see his swollen chest and feminine figure. He was dressed just as Colette had been! That voice! It was Colette's! Somehow, while she had changed into a rat, he had changed into Colette!

Linguini knelt down looked at the new rat, She said, "Colette. Is that really you?" The rat squeaked and squealed, but she could not understand it. In frustration she said, "I am sorry Colette. I can't understand you!"

Suddenly, an unexpected voice from behind her said, "She is asking how this could happen, and why do you you have her body?" With more squeaks, including a scream from the now female Linguini, the voice added, "And who am I?"

Linguini turned, and in shock, saw a man who she recognized immediately. He male body! "Who... who are you?"

He smiled, "It is me, the one you called 'Little Chef'! My real name was Remy by the way.

She looked at him, dressed in his chef's clothing just at she had been minutes ago. "Did, well, did you do this to us?"

He smiled, "No. I don't know how this happened, but for me this is great! I can cook! And I don't need to pretend to be you anymore. I already AM you! This is great! I am Linguini and you are Colette!" He ignored the squeaked protests of the rat that used to be Colette.
14532211.title: Go for it

choices: Remy lays down the rules to Colette
Linguini realizes she really is in love with Remy
145322111.content:
Colette let out a long series of squeaks, whines and squeals, then she hopped off of the chair and ran into what had been 'her' bedroom. She was amazed as the weight of the door as she managed to push it closed. (Not realizing that she now had no way to open it again in her current form.)

Linguini called out, "Colette! Wait! Don't run off!"

But Remy put a hand on her shoulder and said, "Let her go. She needs time."

Linguini looked up at Remy, "What was she saying before she ran in there?"

Remy shook his head, "She was saying that her life is over now. What is she to do?" He smiled, "But she is beautiful for a rat. There are many male rats who would love a wife like her. And She can still cook! I proved that!"

Linguini looked down at herself, "But can I? Without you to control me, how am I supposed to cook?"

He smiled, "You are a girl now, and remember your position in the kitchen. Your duties are clearly laid out and your responsibilities are very limited. You only assist with preparations. Just assist and you will be fine. You will also learn as you watch." He paused, Then said, "And I will be glad to teach you." He smiled, "I never realized until now just how beautiful Colette was, and now, you are." He took her hand and held it.

Linguini was not sure how to react as Remy took her hand. She wanted to pull it away, but his smile mesmerized her, and she felt her heart flutter for some strange reason. "You... you think that I am, well, beautiful?"

Linguini had no idea that Remy had a reputation among the female rats. He had been a charmer. Now in human form, he found himself a natural, while Linguini found herself confused by a flood of new feelings and emotions. Remy smiled, "I find you very, very beautiful." He took her other hand and stepped in very close to her. He softly said, "I owe you so much. You gave me my first real opportunity to cook. To prove I can be a chef. Now, in these bodies, I can at last tell you, and show you, how much I appreciate what you did for me."

Linguini was about to say that no thanks were necessary, but before she realized what was happening, Remy was leaning wrapping his arms around her as he pressed his lips to hers! At first, she struggled and tried to push him away, but it was not long before the strange feelings of pleasure in her body caused her to melt, and soon, she was kissing him back! All of Linguini's life, he had been isolated, and only the love of his now deceased mother sustained him. But these feelings were wonderful. Was this love? Would Remy take care of her? She realized that she might truly like being Colette!

A couple of hours later, the new lovers heard a scratching on the bedroom door accompanied by loud squeaks and squeals. It was Remy who got up and let Colette out of the bedroom. As soon as the door was open, Colette ran out, scurried across the floor, jumped up on the couch next to Linguini, and started a long string of squeaks, squeals and other sounds.

Linguini looked down at her, then up at Remy. "What is she saying?"

Remy was ready though, "Do not worry my dear. She is warning you about what it is like to be a woman in a world of male chefs." He stroked her hair, "But do not worry, I will take care of you." He saw the protests forming in Colette's little rat face, so he pulled Linguini to her feet. "My love, why don't you go and fix your hair and freshen up. I will explain things to Colette."

Linguini's heart fluttered when he called her 'my love'! "Oh! Um, of course... my love." She blushed at she said the last part, and rushed into the bathroom and closed the door to hide her excitement.

Remy smiled down at Colette, who was standing on her hind legs, hand's on her hips, in a very un-rat-like pose. He just smiled.
145322111.title: The new Linguini romances the new Colette

1453221111.content:
Remy held Colette back as Linguini vanished into the bathroom. Then Colette turned on Remy, "What do you think you are doing to her! And that is 'my' body! I don't want her kissing you, or doing anything else for that matter!" She stomped, "And you are just taking advantage of her! She is not used to being a woman. You are toying with her emotions on purpose!"

Remy smiled, "First, that might have 'been' your body, but it is Linguinis now. You need to learn how to live, and survive, as a rat now. And if you want my help, you won't try to interfere again." That calmed Colette down a little, "And second, you are wrong." He paused, "Well, mostly wrong. It is true, I am manipulating her to fall in love with me. But it is for her own good."

That confused Colette, "How can that be for her good? I have dealt with men like you before. They only broke my heart!"

Remy sat down, "Look. You were an intelligent, competent, driven young woman who had to fight for professional respect among a mostly male group of peers. You had to fight, but you could." He paused, "But you don't know Linguini. What you saw was a shy but talented young chef who could be great. You were falling in love more with me than him. The real Linguini was always the opposite of you. Dim, incompetent, and confused about what to do after the death of his mother. If not for me, he would have been lucky to hold a job taking out the trash!"

He sighed, "I know it sounds bad, but didn't you see her? For the first time in her life, she feels loved. It is already giving her confidence to think she is pretty. She might be focused on me, but that is the first time in her life she has been focused on anything."

Colette wasn't convinced, "Even if what you say is true. It will break her heart when you leave her."

Remy smiled, "That will not happen, I promise you. I don't know how this happened, but it means that I can be a real chef now. And if Linguini had not been helping me, I wouldn't be here. I don't know if I will ever love her as she will love me, but I swear to you, I will never leave her. I will care for her as long as I have strength."

Colette was actually moved, "I do believe you. She is lucky to have you." She sobbed a little, "I wish I was your lover, but now I am only a rat!"

Remy said, "Don't say that! Remember, I was a rat too. I guess that is why I can understand you but she can't. I won't kid you and tell you it is easy being a rat, but I will help you as much as I can. Like Linguini, I feel that I am in your debt as well." He smiled, "You are very cute for a rat, and you will find the males just as attracted to you as human males were. If you seek love, you will not have to look far."

Colette shuddered, "Love a rat! I doubt it!"

Remy shrugged, "What choice do you have? Besides, you haven't met my friends yet. There is only one thing."

She looked up at him, "And that is?"

He shook his head, "We can't keep calling you Colette. Since the change, Linguini will need to take your name, and I his name. And Colette is a terrible name for a rat. I think you would do best with my one Aunt's name. Ratina. A very beautiful name for a rat."

She gasped, "Ratina! Never!"

Just then, Linguini stepped back out, "So. how are you two doing?"

Colette tried to squeak to her, but Remy said, "Wonderful! She understands more things now. Oh, and by the way.." He went on to explain why they should use the names that went with their bodies, then added, "And of course, that means we can't keep calling her Colette. For a new name, she selected Ratina."

Colette/Ratina tried to protest, but of course, Linguini could not understand her, "Oh? Well that is cute! Nice to meet you Ratina!" Colette/Ratina tried to protest.Linguini said, "What is she saying now... Linguini." She blushed as she used that name on Remy.

He smiled, "Oh, she thanked you and said it is time for us to go. I will still need to introduce her to my friends tonight." He scooped her up in his hat, trapping her in there, "I need to go for now my love. Get your rest, and I will see you at work in the morning.... my lovely Colette."

Linguini/Colette blushed, and then kissed Remy/Linguini goodnight.
1453221111.title: Remy lays down the rules to Colette

choices: Colette/Ratina shows up at his flat a few nights later
14532211111.content:
Remy gently picked up Colette/Ratina and said, "Come Ratina. Colette has to get some rest, and I promised to help you also."

She looked up at him, "I don't know if I can go through with it. What if they reject me?"

He smiled as they walked out, "Rat's do not reject their own. Besides, you have nothing to worry about. I promise you that." He took her to a sewer grate very close to the restaurant. There, he called out, and soon, over a dozen of his friends were there! He set her down, They stared at her the moment they saw her. If she had grown up a female rat, she would have recognized the intense lust of their looks.She looked at them, and was a bit surprised to find that she actually was finding some of them attractive. They jumped to introduce themselves to 'Ratina'. "There. You see? They are more than happy to welcome you to the family!"

Colette/Ratina was still looking at them, "Yes. I suppose so.... but..." As soon as she had gotten close to them, she got a huge whiff of their male pheromones, though she didn't realize that is what it was. And as soon as she did, something started happening to her body. "But... I am... feeling... so strange.... all of a sudden. It...well... I feel... um..."

Remy finished for her, "Horny? Of course you do. You are a young female and you have not been bred yet. You are in heat my dear."

That snapped Colette/Ratina out of it, temporarily, "In heat!?!?! There is no way! I can't! I won't. You can't make me!" But she was already feeling something that she was beginning to understand the meaning of. She had to get away from these males quickly! "Take me back! Quick! Before it is too late!"

Remy grinned, "Sorry Ratina. It is already too late. There is only one way to make those feelings go away. You can choose your mate now, or you can run. If you run, you can at least be sure that the male who catches you has some good strength and stamina."

She groaned in longing, "Noooo! I... must... get...away!" With that she ran for the only cover she could see, down the sewer.

Remy watched his friends take off after her. Poor Colette. She didn't understand, yet, that she was giving off an inviting scent that every male rat for miles could follow. There really was no escape for her. When he saw her again, she would be pregnant. There was no avoiding that. He was sure that she would make a good mother though. He hoped that she liked being a mother, since a female rat had an average litter of eight or more, and ten or more litters a year. Alas, unlike Remy, who had a chance at being a chef as a male rat, Ratina would soon be too busy with her children to worry about cooking!

The new Linguini hummed as he headed home, loving the idea of having children himself, with the new Colette.

15223212221.content:
Bower passed the crown from one clawed hand to the other, eyeing it curiously. Kamek had recovered it and handed it to Bowser, but when asked what exactly it did, the wizard had simply blushed and flown away. Bowser then looked at himself in the mirror. Despite being the King of Koopas, Bowser had never worn a crown. He never really felt as though they suited him, after all.

Suddenly, the koopa was hit with an idea. Princess Peach had never shown interest in him, despite how powerful and cool and he knew he was. Perhaps she disliked his lack of decorum? The idea was silly, of course, but when you face as many rejections as Bowser had, any idea sounds worth a try.

Poof!

The moment the crown had been placed on his head, Bowser felt something change. And as the smoke cleared, he realized what had happened. Or should I say, she.

Instead of the visage of a powerful turtle reflecting back at her, she instead saw a woman about six feet tall, with tan skin and sharp red hair. Her face resembled that of Peach's, but her lips were fuller and her eyes red and slanted. She still had her horns, and a small shell on her back, but the rest of her body was totally different. She looked mostly human, with an hourglass figure squeezed into a black dress.

Bowser, or should I say, Bowsette stared, grabbing hold of her breasts as if this was all an illusion that would be dispersed by touch. The feeling of pleasure that shot through her made it very clear that they were very soft, very sensitive, and very real. She could feel her tail wag underneath her dress. What should she do about the crown?
